body.p: You can run most operating systems (OSs) successfully on a virtual machine (VM) in .
The virtual hardware determines the choice of guest OSs available, as does the host machine. Ensure you take all aspects of VM configuration into consideration when creating a VM.
Oracle provides guest additions and premier support for selected OSs.
Other guest OSs can be used with , but only qualify for limited support. Therefore, resolution of customer issues for such guest OSs cannot be assured.
